preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure out 40 g of nickel powder using a precision scale. 
 2. Measure 10 g of palladium powder. 
 3. Measure 20 g of lead powder. 
 4. Measure 30 g of scandium powder. 
 5. Combine all measured powders in a clean, dry mixing container. 
 6. Use a spatula to mix the powders thoroughly until a homogeneous mixture is formed.
